hero.title: TickFlow - Elegant Online Clock
hero.subtitle: A clean and beautiful web clock application that helps you better manage time and improve productivity.

1.title: Elegant Design
1.description: Carefully crafted interface, simple yet sophisticated, making time display a pleasure.

2.title: Multi-timezone Support
2.description: Support for multiple time zones worldwide, easily switch between different regional times.

3.title: Customization
3.description: Customize clock styles, colors, and layouts to create your own unique clock interface.

cta.title: Start Using TickFlow
cta.description: Experience elegant time management now, making every moment meaningful.
